Poker Camp is a project by [Max Chiswick](mailto:max@poker.camp) and [Ross Rheingans-Yoo](mailto:ross@poker.camp).

![](./assets/pcaces.png)

## Mission
To build the best program to teach practical reasoning under uncertainty

## Max bio ([LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxchiswick/))
- 2008-2012: Online poker pro on PokerStars

- 2017: MSc with thesis on AI poker at Technion Israel Institute of Technology with [Nahum Shimkin](https://webee.technion.ac.il/shimkin/index.html)

- 2019 and 2022: [Two poker research papers](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Chiswick,+M) with [Sam Ganzfried](http://www.ganzfriedresearch.com/)
